import React,{Component}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import classNames from'classnames';// @ts-ignore
import AnimatedNumber from'animated-number-react';import Controls from'./controls';import RPM from'./rpm';import Fuel from'./fuel';import Engine from'./engine';const initialState={inVehicle:false,engine:{health:100,active:false},velocity:0,rpm:0,fuel:{current:0,max:100},locked:false,seatbelt:false,cruise:false};export default class Speedometer extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state=initialState;}componentDidMount(){rpc.register('Speedometer-UpdateState',state=>this.setState(()=>state));}componentWillUnmount(){rpc.unregister('Speedometer-UpdateState');}render(){const{inVehicle,engine,velocity,rpm,fuel,cruise,locked,seatbelt}=this.state;return inVehicle&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('speedometer',{active:engine.active})},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"speedometer_velocity"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AnimatedNumber,{value:velocity,duration:300,formatValue:value=>parseInt(value,10).toString().padStart(3,'0')}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",null,"\u041A\u041C\\\u0427")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(RPM,{amount:engine.active?rpm:0}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Fuel,{amount:fuel.current*100/fuel.max}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Engine,{health:engine.health}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Controls,{binds:this.props.binds,engine:engine.active,cruise:cruise,lock:locked,seatbelt:seatbelt}));}}
